scripts.build: wp-scripts build affiliate/productCard/src/index.js --output-path=affiliate/productCard/build/ && wp-scripts build affiliate/productCarousel/src/index.js --output-path=affiliate/productCarousel/build
scripts.start: wp-scripts build affiliate/productCard/src/index.js --output-path=affiliate/productCard/build/ && wp-scripts build affiliate/productCarousel/src/index.js --output-path=affiliate/productCarousel/build
